text: 21 Famous People Who Have Spoken Out For Palestine "Every human deserves basic rights, treatment, and security; no matter their nationality, religion, ethnicity, or where they were born." On Oct. 7, around 1,200 Israelis were reportedly killed in attacks by Hamas.
